{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$20.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with COMPUTERSHARE INVESTOR SERVICES.

Across 8 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (25%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 29% and the average number of amendments was 16. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$1.4M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 5.99 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$65.4M. The longest contract was 25.03 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$522.8M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
